name: Be On The Scene
description: Be On The Scene is an online community.
overview:
Be On The Scene is an online community for creative individuals & performers to showcase their talent - whether it is acting, singing, photography, modeling or comedy. The community provides a forum for discussion & a portal to talent for agents.

The company founders have good experience in connecting talented individuals to the best agents & management available. The community works to support fresh new talent in presenting themselves to the right people.

Live events starring members are held throughout the year & provide the perfect opportunity for contributors to make themselves seen & heard. That’s not the only benefit of being part of this community - audition notices, job openings, entertainment industry news & networking opportunities are shared. Users can also set up professional profiles to help build their presence & following in the industry.
